characters.description: A member of the Silent Rose with an attitude.
characters.name: Aileas

characters.description: '''Alora, the Empress of Eldveil.''' Fey Empress of the Sproutfolk, she has seemingly abandoned her wards. They patiently await her return.
characters.name: Alora

characters.description: A Sproutfolk hidden underground, waiting for the Ode to leave. More coming soon...
characters.name: Artacho

characters.description: The restless spirit of a collaborator put to pyre during the reign of the Fire King Fenn Jotar.
characters.name: Ashen Spirit

characters.description: A Sinecure mercenary wielding the Unsula. At level 10 and higher, they are replaced by Elite variants and wield a pair of axes.
characters.name: Assassin

characters.description: Cycle and tide was the chain he opt 'bide... In death, 'round his neck a callous ring chews hide.
characters.name: Atajan

characters.description: Story? No story really. Avakot is a Sproutfolk: a stout and stalky breed of living-plant native to Midrath. Though unaffected by the Spellsong, Avakot has a painfully persistent sneeze to which he credits the stodgy air expelled by the Ode'n Mistrels.
characters.name: Avakot

characters.description: A powerful Sinecure Officer.
characters.name: Axe Banneret

characters.description: A heavy Sinecure mercenary.
characters.name: Axe Knight

characters.description: A flying, shrimp-like creature carrying an explosive lantern.
characters.name: Baliq

characters.description: A sage in the Order of the Pensives.
characters.name: Balmus

characters.description: A powerful Sinecure Officer.
characters.name: Banneret Anara

characters.description: A powerful Sinecure Officer.
characters.name: Banneret Kylst

characters.description: A powerful Sinecure Officer.
characters.name: Banneret Toshtan

characters.description: A hound under Ode'n spell.
characters.name: Battle Dog

characters.description: A queen of Aurel, a land outside of Midrath. Gifted Midrath with the seed of the Grimpante Tree by dropping it into a bottle and casting it into the ocean Salz.
characters.name: Bernadette

characters.description: Ward of the Wevetwood, his roar be their defender. Arbearer to the voicing trees, his soft paws be their mender. Through bark and bud, The Omen Bear, Bromius.
characters.name: Bromius (Character)

characters.description: A member of the Silent Rose, eager to prove herself.
characters.name: Bug

characters.description: The acting Castellan of Fort Curlail, this bow-wielding Sinecure trickster is loyal to the Ode'n ways and outwits Envoys with devious teleportation and ranged attacks.
characters.name: Castellan Huthra

characters.description: The acting Castellan of Fort Kearnhold, this greatsword-wielding Sinecure warrior is loyal to the Ode'n ways and clad in plate of gold. Though some whisper that he may fear the flame...
characters.name: Castellan Malrog

characters.description: '''Cathal''', Son of the Packhunt. One of the four cubs of the Omen Wolf, Orengall.
characters.name: Cathal

characters.description: '''Ciar''', Daughter of the Dusk. One of the four cubs of the Omen Wolf, Orengall.
characters.name: Ciar

characters.description: A creeper now slithers through Alca’s swamps. This armoured foe takes reduced damage while on the move, protected by a hardened shell. But when it stops and exposes its vulnerable flesh, strike quickly. Beware its volley of spikes!
characters.name: Corrupted Slug

characters.description: A Soterian corrupted by Ichor exposure.
characters.name: Corrupted Soterian

characters.description: A Sproutfolk corrupted by Ichor exposure.
characters.name: Corrupted Spear Sproutfolk

characters.description: A Sproutfolk corrupted by Ichor exposure.
characters.name: Corrupted Sproutfolk

characters.description: A powerful Sproutfolk corrupted by Ichor exposure.
characters.name: Corrupted Sproutfolk Brute

characters.description: '''Cuan''', Son of the Dreamer's Moon. One of the four cubs of the Omen Wolf, Orengall.
characters.name: Cuan

characters.description: The Ode'n constellation of destruction.
characters.name: Culveer

characters.description: A blind Omen Moose; the first beast encountered by the Envoy. It was she who pulled the Envoy from the shore after their banishment.
characters.name: Dale Seer

characters.description: A cast-out Ode who hits hard and roams open ground, tuned as a fast, punishing duel.
characters.name: Discharged Nimrod

characters.description: Grandfather of the Envoy, and resides within Rivernest. He once wielded the Juniper bow.
characters.name: Doyen

characters.description: A stronger Sinecure mercenary wielding the Unsula.
characters.name: Elite Assassin

characters.description: A stronger Sinecure mercenary wielding a mace and shield.
characters.name: Elite Guard

characters.description: A stronger Sinecure mercenary wielding a Vasp-IV.
characters.name: Elite Halberdier

characters.description: A stronger light Sinecure mercenary wielding a Blitzel.
characters.name: Elite Hunter

characters.description: A stronger light Sinecure mercenary wielding an Odiac.
characters.name: Elite War Caster

characters.description: A small, spider-like creature found infesting the Neath'uns.
characters.name: Elite Weaver

characters.description: A brood-queen that webs the arena and calls lesser scuttlers to overwhelm you.
characters.name: Etheldred The Weaver

characters.description: The Fire King, Fenn Jotar. Wild wielder of the flaming sword Igne Mora. Reckoner of the legendary Cassid general "Napo 'Fair Neck' Agnes." 'Twas this fiery duel that won the freedom of the Dendrit people. A hero immortal, quelled only by grief.
characters.name: Fenn Jotar

characters.description: A prolific drunk and member of the Silent Rose.
characters.name: Filib

characters.description: A Midrathian queen who resided within the seaside castle of Mirifuir.
characters.name: Finngualla

characters.description: A new Agari added in Preludes 12.
characters.name: Fore-Feller Hewyl

characters.description: The legendary Omen Stag of oral fables, who resides within the secluded and secretive Glades of Andurin.
characters.name: Garren Rood (Character)

characters.description: The spirit of a warrior of Clan Jotar.
characters.name: Ghost Knight

characters.description: A Sproutfolk hidden underground, waiting for the Ode to leave.
characters.name: Ginsy

characters.description: A flying, shrimp-like creature carrying an explosive lantern.
characters.name: Glades Baliq

characters.description: The most common of Sinecure mercenaries. Most Soldiers are replaced by Elite variants at level 10 and above.
characters.name: Glades Soldier

characters.description: Once soulful Sproutfolk turned corrupted commander, this Sproutfolk Agari stalks the Neath'uns.
characters.name: Gourdo

characters.description: An aging member of the Silent Rose.
characters.name: Griogair

characters.description: A stalking hunter, seeking Gruul and blood.
characters.name: Gruul Seeker Ruthos

characters.description: A new Agari added in Preludes 12.
characters.name: Gruul Seeker Sontaro

characters.description: A Sinecure mercenary wielding a mace and shield. At level 10 and higher they are replaced by Elite variants.
characters.name: Guard

characters.description: A Sinecure mercenary wielding a Vasp-IV. At level 10 and higher they are replaced by Elite variants.
characters.name: Halberdier

characters.description: A light Sinecure mercenary wielding a Blitzel. At level 10 and higher they are replaced by Elite variants.
characters.name: Hunter

characters.description: A roaming spirit inhabiting a humanoid husk. Lays in wait to ambush the living.
characters.name: Impidh Mockery

characters.description: By Iridis we knew empathy, imagination, arcanics.
characters.name: Iridis

characters.description: A Primordial Envoy, and Paragon of the Virtue of Grace.
characters.name: Josalfar

characters.description: Once soulful Sproutfolk turned corrupted commander, be wary of its minions.
characters.name: Kabocha

characters.description: Royal blacksmith of Fenn Jotar.
characters.name: Karlik the Torrid

characters.description: A relentless Mendicant enforcer clad in heavy armor.
characters.name: Knell Knight

characters.description: Once heir to the Knightmaidens in a time before the Ode, Lady Deora currently serves as Regent of Dendria turned spy to assist the envoy in sabotaging Lord Synod's plans.
characters.name: Lady Deora

characters.description: By Ode'n reign... this beast, we claim! - ''Spell-sung Deora''
characters.name: Lady Deora (Boss)

characters.description: '''Lord Synod''' is the High Sovereign of the Ode, leading his armies on a conquest across Alca. He desires to capture the Omen Beasts for his own cause, and aims to burn all traces of history from Midrath - taking anything of value as tribute.
characters.name: Lord Synod

characters.description: Converted the region of Dendria into a fiefdom.
characters.name: Lost King

characters.description: A Foresage in the Order of the Pensives.
characters.name: Luitfrid

characters.description: A powerful Sinecure Officer.
characters.name: Mace Banneret

characters.description: A heavy Sinecure mercenary.
characters.name: Mace Knight

characters.description: A bored Inquisitor of Lord Synod who oversees the collection of earthling resources. Takes pleasure in seeing the Envoy attempt to thwart her plans, but the mood is short lived.
characters.name: Mada

characters.description: A Prentice in the Order of the Pensives.
characters.name: Mathilde

characters.description: An undead knight of the implacable Mendicant legion.
characters.name: Mendicant Caster Knight

characters.description: An undead knight of the implacable Mendicant legion.
characters.name: Mendicant Knight

characters.description: An undead knight of the implacable Mendicant legion.
characters.name: Mendicant Mace Knight

characters.description: An undead knight of the implacable Mendicant legion.
characters.name: Mendicant Sword Knight

characters.description: An undead knight of the implacable Mendicant legion.
characters.name: Mendicant Thrall Knight

characters.description: A Sinecure Officer carrying Ode'n intel. Found only during Faction Tales.
characters.name: Messenger

characters.description: A roaming spirit inhabiting a humanoid husk. Lays in wait to ambush the living.
characters.name: Mockery

characters.description: From Mora came strength, bravery, resolve.
characters.name: Mora

characters.description: The mother of the Envoy. Saved them the night the Ode fell upon Alca.
characters.name: Mother

characters.description: Wrote the nine laws of her reign at age nine. A legislation she upheld when she was crowned Queen of Midrath in the year 680.
characters.name: Muireall Jotar

characters.description: A legendary Cassid general who once marched against the Fire King, Fenn Jotar.
characters.name: Napo Agnes

characters.description: Orengall's stolen daughter. Runt of the pack, though cunning. Held captive by Tempest Bayor.
characters.name: Nightling

characters.description: The Sinecure's "big brother". A brute of an opponent wielding Duhk Halic... And the tempest itself.
characters.name: Nimrod

characters.description: A stationary cannon emplacement that will detect and fire on Envoys from long range.
characters.name: Ode'n Bisulcam

characters.description: An Ode'n area denial device.
characters.name: Ode'n Mine

characters.description: A small pedestal of Ode'n technology. Terraforms the air around it, making it breathable for the Ode.
characters.name: Ode'n Mistrel

characters.description: A tower of Ode'n technology. Spews Ichor into the waterways, rendering it drinkable for the Ode.
characters.name: Ode'n Moaner

characters.description: Ancestor of Garren Rood. The Dendrit people of old crafted the Stag Shrine in his honor in the year 310. It is said that Odulf's three-pronged antlers parted the canopy of the Andurin Glades.
characters.name: Odulf Rood

characters.description: According to legend, Rauthard was said to have filled Oro's Well with ale during a dry spell.
characters.name: Old King Rauthard

characters.description: Ichor creeps through fen and fog... An Omen croaker’s curse.
characters.name: Omen Croaker

characters.description: Fender of the Furthing packlands. The silver tooth of Iridis. Orengall, The Omen Shewolf. She is the spirit of feral freedom with a soft belly only for her pups.
characters.name: Orengall (Character)

characters.description: A lifelong member of the College of Pensives, now your personal scribe. Orlick the Bicameral is so named for the infant upon his shoulder, his 'Little Genius'. Mayhaps, in his endless afterlife, Orlick will finally find the time to finish his book…
characters.name: Orlick

characters.description: Oro is said to be the son of Iridis, according to the lore of Oro's Well.
characters.name: Oro

characters.description: An ancient Fey healer and witch. Roused by rain, was she, a new witch abloom in the garden of Eldveil.
characters.name: Oscelda (Character)

characters.description: A ghostly body inhabiting a knight's helm.
characters.name: Phantom Sprout

characters.description: A Prentice in the Order of the Pensives.
characters.name: Pieitre

characters.description: The main playable character of Soulframe; once an Ode conscript, now returned to Alca to begin anew.
characters.name: Player Envoy

characters.description: A miner sent to Midrath with Napo Agnes.
characters.name: Poppy

characters.description: A Primordial Envoy, and Paragon of the Virtue of Courage.
characters.name: Pothia

characters.description: An Aftsage in the Order of the Pensives.
characters.name: Proctor

characters.description: A heavily corrupted Ode'n Battle Dog.
characters.name: Reaper

characters.description: A Sage in the Order of the Pensives.
characters.name: Rodrich

characters.description: A Sproutfolk hidden underground, waiting for the Ode to leave.
characters.name: Rootabag

characters.description: Saphene bestowed cunning, agility, insight.
characters.name: Saphene

characters.description: A new Agari added in Preludes 12.
characters.name: Seachnall The Widower

characters.description: A heavy Sinecure mercenary.
characters.name: Shield Knight

characters.description: The Ode'n constellation of natural order; the Ode'n star of justice.
characters.name: Sidae

characters.description: A mace-wielding foe loyal to the Banneret ways.
characters.name: Sinecure-errant Gawth

characters.description: A new Agari added in Preludes 12.
characters.name: Sinecure-errant Vella

characters.description: An ancient Fey archer and assassin. Borne of a moonlight pond, was he, with an arrow ready-nocked.
characters.name: Sirin (Character)

characters.description: The most common of Sinecure mercenaries. Most Soldiers are replaced by Elite variants at level 10 and above.
characters.name: Soldier

characters.description: A ghostly body inhabiting a knight's helm.
characters.name: Spirit

characters.description: A legendary blacksmith of the Steelsinger's Guild.
characters.name: Steelsinger Kane

characters.description: A powerful Sinecure Officer.
characters.name: Sword Banneret

characters.description: A heavy Sinecure mercenary.
characters.name: Sword Knight

characters.description: An Envoy servant of the Ode, responsible for capturing the player Envoy as a child.
characters.name: Tempest Bayor

characters.description: An ancient Fey champion. Chief of the Solist Warriors, was she, wreathed in flame and fury.
characters.name: Tethren (Character)

characters.description:
Descend into the Crypt of the Circade, a haunted dungeon where the noble once known as The Circade stirs again.
His three souls fractured, Circade's restless echoes now haunt a dungeon beneath Midrath.
characters.name: The Circade

characters.description: From the depths of the Ichor-grave, he rises. Crowned and seated upon a corrupted throne, the Mendicant King commands the battlefield with slow, deliberate cruelty.
characters.name: The Mendicant King

characters.description: The Omen Beast Bromius, corrupted by Ichor exposure.
characters.name: The Waste Bear (Boss)

characters.description: Clad in ancient armour and speaking in twisted tongues, this challenger haunts Alca’s lands.
characters.name: Thrice-bound Impidh

characters.description: The Omen Beast Garren Rood, corrupted by Duhk Halic.
characters.name: Torment Stag

characters.description: An Ode'n Inquisitor who appears in the opening of Soulframe. It is she who sends the Envoy back down to Alca's surface.
characters.name: Torque Inquisitor

characters.description: Successor to Kane, the Steelsinger of legend. Tuvalkane toiled under master's tutelage until the very moment of her untimely death. Days of hammering. Nights of sharpening. All to reach an eternal afterlife... Back in the bellows.
characters.name: Tuvalkane

characters.description: A spirit of Ichor attempting to mimic the Omen Beast Garren Rood.
characters.name: Vadagar Stag

characters.description: The Brewer of Hues, the master of Poppets; she is the Witch Verminia. Seemingly rendered colourblind by death, Verminia relies on the auras of the afterlife to sniff her way around. Assuredly, this hinders not her impeccable taste in fashion.
characters.name: Verminia

characters.description: A Gruul trap, meant to contain the Ode's enemies for more convenient execution
characters.name: Voltaic Snare

characters.description: A light Sinecure mercenary wielding an Odiac. At level 10 and higher they are replaced by Elite variants.
characters.name: War Caster

characters.description: A Mendicant caster from the Wastes. Face the Wazzard, a mendicant trickster who steals your Pact and splits into skittering horrors.
characters.name: Wazzard of Wastes

characters.description: A small, spider-like creature found infesting the Neath'uns.
characters.name: Weaver

characters.description: Carried by wind and whimsy, this sprightly plant drifts through Alca’s wilds. Approach with care! If startled, it explodes in a burst of pollen. But sneak close enough, and you may pluck a reward without waking it.
characters.name: Will-o-wing

characters.description: A Mendicant caster from the Wastes, rumoured to carry a special Talisman and Staff.
characters.name: Wraith of Wastes

characters.description: A Dale Seer camel, and merchant within the Nightfold. A member of the otherwise-enslaved Arid Caravan. Zenith allows Envoys to access the '''Wares of Zenith''', Soulframe's in-game market.
characters.name: Zenith
